product_name: Native Eyewear Andes Polarized Sunglasses - Men's
long_description: Eyewear protection for year-round use, the Native Andes polarized sunglasses feature interchangeable lenses to protect your eyes from sunshine and glare any time of the day. Includes 1 set of polarized lens and 1 set of SportFlex(TM) lenses, for a total of 2 sets of lenses. Interchangeable lens system lets you switch out lenses to accommodate a variety of light conditions and activities. N3(TM) polarized lenses block 40% of infrared light (decreasing eye fatigue), offer blue light filtering and 100% UV protection to minimize haze and enhance clarity. Lenses are built to withstand a high-velocity impact. Frames endure extreme highs and lows in temperature. Frames are extremely lightweight, yet flexible and durable enough to withstand high velocity collisions. Self-adjusting Cushinol(TM) nosepads and ear stems create a nonslip grip that keeps sunglasses in place, ensuring a soft feel and personalized fit. Temple ends hug behind your ears to keep sunglasses in place. Cam-action spring hinges quickly lock temples into position. Asphalt frames feature polarized gray lenses and are ideal for extremely bright sunlight; gray tint helps maintain color saturation and natural contrasts. Additional SportFlex orange-yellow lenses have a mirror coating suitable for a range of low lighting-cloudy, overcast, dusk and dawn. Native Andes interchangeable polarized sunglasses include a protective case and a soft pouch that doubles as a cleaning cloth. Frames best fit medium profiles.
short_description: Eyewear protection for year-round use, the Native Andes polarized sunglasses feature interchangeable lenses to protect your eyes from sunshine and glare any time of the day.
